summary: In their secluded farmhouse, a mother (a former surgeon) teaches her daughter, Francisca, anatomy, and life & death are not to be feared. One afternoon, a mysterious visitor shatters the ... See full summary »
cast: Diana Agostini|Olivia Bond|Will Brill|Joey Curtis-Green|Flora Diaz|Kika Magalhães|Paul Nazak|Taahir Shah|Clara Wong
keywords: dead body|death of father|death of mother|loneliness|cattle
title: The Eyes of My Mother
